suppress.notes: Supresses CVE-2016-6311 on undertow-core-2.3.10.Final.jar The vulnerability is about a disclosure of internal IP addresses when used in JBoss EAP 7.
Supresses CVE-2024-1459 on undertow-core-2.3.10.Final.jar The vulnerability is about a a path traversal vulnerability when used in JBoss EAP.
Supresses CVE-2023-5379 on undertow-core-2.3.10.Final.jar The vulnerability is related to the AJP protocol which is not used in TR2. There is no AJP listener is registered.
